messages.cancelPollCreation: This will cancel the poll creation process

messages.cannotRespondPollTerminated: You cannot respond to this poll, since it was terminated.

messages.pollRestoreConfirmation: This will restore the selected poll

messages.emailNotValid: Email must be a valid email address
messages.passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 6 characters

messages.deleteResponseConfirmation: This will delete the selected response
messages.incorrectPassword: The provided password is not correct

messages.noResponses: No responses recorded against the current poll
messages.pageNotFound: The requested page was not found.

messages.sessionExpired: The session has expired, please login again to continue
